tr.th:
Custom Battle Cost
Custom Battle Cost

div.br: This determines how many hits a unit can withstand alongside armour and melee defence.
The weight of the unit.
How resistant a unit is to missile fire and melee attacks.

A unit with high leadership is less likely to rout in the face of danger.
Leadership is improved by experience in battle.
This is how fast a unit moves.

This determines the chance of a successful hit on the enemy when the unit is engaged in melee.
Battle-hardened troops will gain experience through melee, improving this skill.

This determines the chance of a unit being hit whilst in melee.
This only works in melee and provides no protection from missiles!

The damage caused by a unit's weapon, split between base and armour piercing.
Armour-piercing damage is always applied; base damage can be blocked by armour.
This increases a unit's melee attack and damage when charging.

The amount of ammunition this unit can carry into battle.
Once this has been exhausted the unit will be forced to switch to melee to continue fighting.
After the battle, ammunition is fully replenished.
A long range enables you to hit enemies from a distance, but weapons are still more accurate at shorter ranges.

The damage caused by a missile attack, split between base and armour piercing.
Armour-piercing damage is always applied, base damage can be blocked by armour.

td.img:
Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_exalted_keeper_of_secrets_shadow_0
Exalted Keeper of Secrets (Shadows)
The Exalted Keeper captivates the minds of its foes even as it tears the flesh from their bones.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_exalted_keeper_of_secrets_slaanesh_0
Exalted Keeper of Secrets (Slaanesh)
The Exalted Keeper captivates the minds of its foes even as it tears the flesh from their bones.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_shadow_0
Herald of Slaanesh (Shadows)
An ascended Daemonette and Sorceress of seduction, granted the honour of attending Slaanesh's every dark whim and desire.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_shadow_1
Herald of Slaanesh (Shadows) (Steed of Slaanesh)
The Perfect Prince's most favoured Daemonette, able and willing to hunt their prey across all eternity.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_shadow_2
Herald of Slaanesh (Shadows) (Seeker Chariot)
If the foe does not fall to the chariot's screeching steel blades, they shall instead know the agonising embrace of the Herald atop it.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_shadow_3
Herald of Slaanesh (Shadows) (Exalted Seeker Chariot)
The Glorious Doomrider, a wailing, blade-adorned carriage which conveys a Herald of Slaanesh toward her next enraptured victim at unthinkable speeds.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_slaanesh_0
Herald of Slaanesh (Slaanesh)
An ascended Daemonette and Sorceress of seduction, granted the honour of attending Slaanesh's every dark whim and desire.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_slaanesh_1
Herald of Slaanesh (Slaanesh) (Steed of Slaanesh)
The Perfect Prince's most favoured Daemonette, able and willing to hunt their prey across all eternity.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_slaanesh_2
Herald of Slaanesh (Slaanesh) (Seeker Chariot)
If the foe does not fall to the chariot's screeching steel blades, they shall instead know the agonising embrace of the Herald atop it.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_herald_of_slaanesh_slaanesh_3
Herald of Slaanesh (Slaanesh) (Exalted Seeker Chariot)
The Glorious Doomrider, a wailing, blade-adorned carriage which conveys a Herald of Slaanesh toward her next enraptured victim at unthinkable speeds.

Lords / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_nkari_0
N'Kari
A notorious and ancient Keeper of Secrets, N'Kari has broken empires and countless minds in his ceaseless quest for new depraved sensations.

td.img:
Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_shadow_0
Alluress (Shadows)
This Daemonette has gained the notice of Slaanesh himself, the whispered secrets of his bedchamber granting her untold prestige and power.

Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_shadow_1
Alluress (Shadows) (Steed of Slaanesh)
A favoured Daemonette who directs Slaanesh's sensuous legions and harvests the tormented souls of the fallen.

Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_shadow_2
Alluress (Shadows) (Seeker Chariot)
A champion temptress, spreading seduction, sensation and suffering from a screeching chariot whose razored axels reduce bone to pulp in an instant.

Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_shadow_3
Alluress (Shadows) (Exalted Seeker Chariot)
This Daemonette has gifted Slaanesh sufficient souls to be raised above the rank and file, literally, to preach her temptations.

Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_slaanesh_0
Alluress (Slaanesh)
This Daemonette has gained the notice of Slaanesh himself, the whispered secrets of his bedchamber granting her untold prestige and power.

Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_slaanesh_1
Alluress (Slaanesh) (Steed of Slaanesh)
A favoured Daemonette who directs Slaanesh's sensuous legions and harvests the tormented souls of the fallen.

Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_slaanesh_2
Alluress (Slaanesh) (Seeker Chariot)
A champion temptress, spreading seduction, sensation and suffering from a screeching chariot whose razored axels reduce bone to pulp in an instant.

Heroes / Wizard / wh3_main_sla_cha_alluress_slaanesh_3
Alluress (Slaanesh) (Exalted Seeker Chariot)
This Daemonette has gifted Slaanesh sufficient souls to be raised above the rank and file, literally, to preach her temptations.

Heroes / Melee Specialist / wh3_main_sla_cha_cultist_0
Cultist of Slaanesh
Slaanesh's Cultists have tormented souls, and spend their time gathering secrets and seducing others in the Dark Prince's name.

Heroes / Melee Specialist / wh3_main_sla_cha_cultist_1
Cultist of Slaanesh (Chaos Steed)
Slaanesh's Cultists have tormented souls, and spend their time gathering secrets and seducing others in the Dark Prince's name.

td.img:
Infantry / Sword Infantry / wh3_main_sla_inf_marauders_0
Devoted Marauders of Slaanesh
The mightiest of Norscans, bereft of fear or pity, delighting in every wound and pledged to make endless sacrifices to the Serpent.

Infantry / Spear Infantry / wh3_main_sla_inf_marauders_1
Devoted Marauders of Slaanesh (Spears)
The fearless spearmen of Slaanesh, whose faith grants them unnatural might. They delight in suffering and find rapture in sundered flesh.

Infantry / Whip Infantry / wh3_main_sla_inf_marauders_2
Devoted Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges)
Northmen who willingly join the Daemon legions in their incursions into the mortal realm, granted living lashes of purest torment.

Infantry / Melee Infantry / wh3_main_sla_inf_daemonette_0
Daemonettes of Slaanesh
The hypnotic, dancing footsoldiers of Slaanesh, beguiling senses before shredding flesh with knife-edged claws, euphoric in the gift of pain.

Infantry / Sword Infantry / wh3_dlc20_chs_inf_chaos_warriors_msla
Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh
A ritualistic union with the Dark Prince spurs symphonies of misery inflicted upon His enemies.

Infantry / Melee Infantry / wh3_dlc20_chs_inf_forsaken_msla
Forsaken of Slaanesh
The Dark Prince’s touch warps His followers’ flesh, but the mind is where the greatest damages are wrought.

Infantry / Whip Infantry / wh3_dlc20_chs_inf_chaos_warriors_msla_hellscourges
Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges)
Struck dumb by the sight of sublime warriors, few can escape an excruciating flagellation.

Infantry / Melee Infantry / wh3_main_sla_inf_daemonette_1
Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh
The Daemonettes gather souls with which to entertain Slaanesh for the briefest moment.

Infantry / Sword Infantry / wh3_dlc20_chs_inf_chosen_msla
Chosen of Slaanesh
Slaanesh gifts boons generously, but only a select few resist being consumed by passions, obsession, and sin.

img.alt: Bringers of Beguilement (Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh)

td.img:
Infantry / Melee Infantry / wh3_twa06_sla_inf_daemonette_ror_0
Bringers of Beguilement (Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh)
While rampaging through battle lines, these beguiling figures of uncontrollable lust infect minds with madness at a single touch.

Infantry / Whip Infantry / wh3_dlc20_chs_inf_chosen_msla_hellscourges
Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges)
Cruel pleasure is taken from an enemy’s desperation at being slowly and callously killed, one lash at a time.

Infantry / Sword Infantry / wh_pro04_chs_inf_chaos_warriors_ror_0
Mirror Guard (Chaos Warriors)
An ancient lineage of warriors supremely enhanced by the energies of Chaos, nourished only by carnage and bloodshed.

tr.th:
Custom Battle Cost
Custom Battle Cost

div.br: This determines how many hits a unit can withstand alongside armour and melee defence.
The weight of the unit.
How resistant a unit is to missile fire and melee attacks.

A unit with high leadership is less likely to rout in the face of danger.
Leadership is improved by experience in battle.
This is how fast a unit moves.

This determines the chance of a successful hit on the enemy when the unit is engaged in melee.
Battle-hardened troops will gain experience through melee, improving this skill.

This determines the chance of a unit being hit whilst in melee.
This only works in melee and provides no protection from missiles!

The damage caused by a unit's weapon, split between base and armour piercing.
Armour-piercing damage is always applied; base damage can be blocked by armour.
This increases a unit's melee attack and damage when charging.

The amount of ammunition this unit can carry into battle.
Once this has been exhausted the unit will be forced to switch to melee to continue fighting.
After the battle, ammunition is fully replenished.
A long range enables you to hit enemies from a distance, but weapons are still more accurate at shorter ranges.

The damage caused by a missile attack, split between base and armour piercing.
Armour-piercing damage is always applied, base damage can be blocked by armour.

td.img:
Cavalry & Chariots / Spear Cavalry / wh3_main_sla_cav_hellstriders_0
Hellstriders of Slaanesh
Vainglorious mortals granted the immortal power they crave – at the cost of everything they once were.

Cavalry & Chariots / Melee Cavalry / wh3_main_sla_cav_hellstriders_1
Hellstriders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges)
Bartering their very souls for the saddles of Slaanesh's Daemonic steeds, these shackled mortals flense flesh from bone with their writhing, semi-sentient lashes.

Cavalry & Chariots / Chariots / wh3_main_sla_veh_seeker_chariot_0
Seeker Chariots
A bone-shredding chariot, commanded by capering Daemonettes, dispensing suffering across the length and breadth of the battlefield.

Cavalry & Chariots / Chariot / wh3_dlc20_chs_cav_chaos_chariot_msla
Chaos Chariots of Slaanesh
A Chaos Chariot is a terrifying thing to slam into an enemy line, punching through with maddening strength.

Cavalry & Chariots / Shock Cavalry / wh3_main_sla_cav_seekers_of_slaanesh_0
Seekers of Slaanesh
Daemonettes visting upon their enraptured foes a razor-clawed ballet of blissful torment and agonised yearning.

Cavalry & Chariots / Chariots / wh3_main_sla_veh_hellflayer_0
Hellflayers
A carriage adorned with reaping blades which slice Slaanesh's foes into delicate morsels, their suffering driving its riders into a rapturous frenzy.

Cavalry & Chariots / Shock Cavalry / wh3_main_sla_cav_heartseekers_of_slaanesh_0
Heartseekers of Slaanesh
Death provides no relief, for the Heartseeker's quarry's soul shall become Slaanesh's tormented plaything.

Cavalry & Chariots / Chariot / wh3_main_sla_veh_exalted_seeker_chariot_0
Exalted Seeker Chariot
A fast-moving Daemonic engine; those few unfortunate souls who escape its razored maw are descended upon by its blade-clawed Daemonette riders.

Cavalry & Chariots / Cavalry / wh3_dlc20_chs_cav_chaos_knights_msla
Chaos Knights of Slaanesh
A Slaaneshi Knight's charge always foreshadows an orgy of pain and despair, as he tramples his foes again and again.

Cavalry & Chariots / Shock Cavalry / wh3_twa07_sla_cav_heartseekers_of_slaanesh_ror_0
Eternal Entourage (Heartseekers of Slaanesh)
There's no escaping the relentless pursuit of ones driven by such depraved obsession.

Cavalry & Chariots / Shock Cavalry / wh3_dlc20_chs_cav_chaos_knights_msla_lances
Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances)
The Dark Prince’s cruelty is carried forth by the tip of a lance, piercing hearts and souls in excruciating agony.

Cavalry & Chariots / Chariot / wh3_dlc20_chs_cav_chaos_chariot_msla_ror
The Sibilant Slaughtercade (Chaos Chariots)
Thundering footsteps and a Chariot's heavy rumbling are the last sounds so many hear before their untimely demise.

td.img:
Missile Cavalry & Chariots / Missile Cavalry / wh3_dlc20_chs_cav_marauder_horsemen_msla_javelins
Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh
When debauchery knows no patience it seeks the swiftness of a flesh-fed steed.

td.img:
Monsters & Beasts / Flying Melee Infantry / wh3_main_sla_inf_chaos_furies_0
Chaos Furies (Slaanesh)
The lowliest of the Dark Legion, spitting unspeakable temptations as they pick at their foes' flesh.

Monsters & Beasts / Monstrous Infantry / wh3_main_sla_mon_spawn_of_slaanesh_0
Spawn of Slaanesh
Excess incarnate: a body unravelled and a soul detonated by dark sensation upon dark sensation. A writhing, gnashing obscenity.

Monsters & Beasts / Support Monster / wh3_dlc20_chs_mon_warshrine_msla
Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh
The scent of silk and human flesh accompanies a gilded Warshrine draped in the still-living skins of Slaanesh's tributes.

Monsters & Beasts / Monstrous Infantry / wh3_main_sla_mon_fiends_of_slaanesh_0
Fiends of Slaanesh
The hunting beasts of Slaanesh, scorpion-tailed abominations whose twitching gait belies the nightmarish speed at which they ride down new victims.

Monsters & Beasts / Monster / wh3_main_sla_mon_soul_grinder_0
Soul Grinder (Slaanesh)
A fallen Daemon given new life, of a sort, within a colossal, soul-harvesting hulk.

Monsters & Beasts / Monster / wh3_main_sla_mon_keeper_of_secrets_0
Keeper of Secrets
Master of pain, mistress of sensation, slaying its beguiled foes with razor-clawed precision even as they beg for more.

img.alt: The Marquis of Masochism (Keeper of Secrets)

td.img:
Monsters & Beasts / Monster / wh3_twa08_sla_mon_keeper_of_secrets_0_ror
The Marquis of Masochism (Keeper of Secrets)
“I have such sights to show you!”
